H0.text: how do you say evil eye in greek. Kakomati

H1.text: how do you say evil eye in greek. Poniria Mati

H2.text: how do you say evil eye in greek. Vaskania

H3.text: how do you say evil eye in greek. matiasma

A4.text: In modern Greece, the evil eye is known as kako mati (Greek: κακό μάτι) or simply as mati (μάτι), 'eye'.

A5.text: In Greek theology, the evil eye or vaskania (βασκανία) is considered harmful for the one whose envy inflicts it on others as well as for the sufferer.
